definition: public prosecutor/public procurator (judicial officer whose job may involve both criminal investigation and public prosecution)
to check/to examine/to inspect/to exercise restraint
short name for Chahar Province 察哈爾|察哈尔[Cha2 ha1 er3]
to examine/to inquire/to observe/to inspect/to look into/obvious/clearly evident

sentences.english: But the prosecutor declined on the grounds that the issue should be investigated in the US.
sentences.chinese: 但檢察官拒絕的理由是，這個案子應當在美國調查。

sentences.english: By the orders of the deputy procureur?
sentences.chinese: 是奉了代理檢察官的命令嗎？

sentences.english: Prosecutors said none of the suspects got any real secrets.
sentences.chinese: 檢察官稱嫌疑人沒有得到任何真正的祕密。

sentences.english: Listen to me. The P.A. is going to want to know why you didn’t scream.
sentences.chinese: 聽我說，檢察官會問你爲什麼不喊叫。

sentences.english: The inspector was able to put his finger on the weak point in the suspect's alibi.
sentences.chinese: 檢察官能準確指出嫌疑人辯辭中的弱點。

sentences.english: Prosecutors said Douglas had signed a plea agreement, but the details weren't disclosed.
sentences.chinese: 檢察官說他已簽了辯訴協議，但沒透露具體細節。

sentences.english: In many countries, a state prosecutor can bring a criminal libel suit.
sentences.chinese: 在許多國家，政府檢察官可以提起刑事誹謗訴訟。

sentences.english: I am at your command, Mr. District-Attorney.
sentences.chinese: 檢察官先生，我靜候您的處理。
檢察官德魯羅賓遜驚呆了。

sentences.english: The hearing didn't last long. "Guilty, " the magistrate said.
sentences.chinese: 聽訟沒有持續很長時間，“有罪”檢察官說到。

sentences.english: Prosecutors said they wouldn't indict Mr. Hatoyama due to insufficient evidence.
sentences.chinese: 檢察官說因爲證據不足，不會起訴鳩山由紀夫。

sentences.english: Jon Zug is aproceecutorprosecutor in Albemarle County, where the university is located.
sentences.chinese: 喬恩咋克是學校所坐落的阿爾伯馬爾縣的檢察官。

sentences.english: Prosecutors want to question him about the misuse of public funds.
sentences.chinese: 檢察官想詢問他關於濫用公共基金的事情。

sentences.english: Prosecutors had asked for a 40-year sentence.
sentences.chinese: 檢察官要求判處他40年徒刑。

sentences.english: Prosecutors said he had confessed to those slayings.
sentences.chinese: 檢察官說，他已經承認這些命案。

sentences.english: Regard this as the inquisitor of the case, sheng Hao intervenes among them, mix again east establish meets.
sentences.chinese: 作爲該案的檢察官，勝浩介入其中，再次和東植相見。

definition: Ma Ying-jeou (1950-), Taiwanese Kuomintang politician, Mayor of Taipei 1998-2006, president of Republic of China 2008-2016
on trial (for a crime)/to stand trial
to accuse/to denounce/to make a complaint against/denunciation
